summary: An aspiring filmmaker goes through the ups and downs of romance when he falls for a Christian woman who says she only wants to be friends.
cast: T.R. Silambarasan|Trisha Krishnan|Vtv Ganesh|Raja Krishnamoorthy|Babu Antony|Uma Pathmanabhan|Lakshmi Ramakrishnan|Samantha Ruth Prabhu|Naga Chaitanya Akkineni|K.S. Ravikumar|Trisha Alex|Janani Iyer|Pradeep Kottayam
title: Vinnaithaandi Varuvaayaa
